page.title: 07SETTLE POLICE STATION
page.content: They get{40}calls a week. Settle police station covers{Giggleswick, {Long Preston Wigglesworth}and at night {Bentham and Malham.}The main reasons for calls are crimes, road accidents, lost and found property. They have{2 cells and make about{3}arrests a week. The equipment is personal radios, Ford cars, computers, car radios. There are{2}sergeants. This job is very tiring but enjoyable. Police cars can go up to{130}MPH. In this area a lot of people go {climbing and caving.}To cope with any problems there is the{Cave and Fell {Rescue,}manned by volunteers. If there is an accident a call comes to the police who ring the contoller. The controller contacts the experts who go to the rescue. This year they have had 2 call outs, which is very few.
